summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 7%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in pressure (down 6 mbar), light levels (up 4174 lux), and cloud levels (up 536 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1467 m), light levels (up 6486 lux), and rainfall (down 0.3 mm) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s cloud levels is 536.1m lower than yesterday, 1041.7m lower than past week, 1466.9m lower than past month.

Yesterday’s cloud levels showed a low of 860m and a peak of 3110m, averaging 1337.2m; the week and month recorded warmer averages.
cloud levels.summary: The sky’s high clouds will permit plenty of sunshine.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; like a nice, warm day. Also, very clammy and humid. Showers, the sky’s high clouds will permit plenty of sunshine, and moderate levels of sunlight will be present. Weather could become unsettled.
